description: Part demolition of the rear of Eagle House and the retention and refurbishment of the remainder of the building together with the erection of a part 7, part 8, part 28 and part 34 storey building plus basement level to provide 340 residential units and 1413 sq. of Class A1 (retail) floor space, 460 sq. of Class A3 (restaurant) floor space, 3730 sq. of Class B1 (office) floor space and 1241 sq. m of Class D2 (Leisure) floor space together with ancillary plant, servicing, 56 basement level car parking spaces.  Associated hard and soft landscaping, alterations to existing vehicular and pedestrian access and associated highway works.
